entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as saying 'Can't be' and pointing out that a location is south, indicating he is one of the people present in the scene.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is watching the painting and is mentioned as being present in the scene with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being present in the scene with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: knight
entities.description: The knight is a character in the painting who falls off his horse and gets angry when he sees Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: pony
entities.description: A fat, dapple-gray pony is mentioned as being in the painting and grazing nonchalantly.

relationships.description: The knight sees Harry, Ron, and Hermione trespassing on his private lands.
The knight also sees Ron, as well as Harry and Hermione.
The knight sees Hermione, along with Harry and Ron.
